page.title: 08FORCES CHILDREN IN CORSHAM
page.content:
Karen Green-aged 12 years 5 months. Born at Norwich-moved to Germany at 6 months-3 years later moved to Locking in Weston-Super-Mare. 5 years later moved back to Germany. Now lives at Colerne near Corsham.Will move again next October! Samantha Britton-12 years 10 months. Born at Tangmear in Sussex moved to Singapore at 6 months.2\ years after moved to Rudloe Manor.2\ years later moved to Innsworth.3 years later moved to Scotland after 1 year moved to Gibraltar. Now lives at Colerne near Corsham will move around 1987-1988.
This has advantages and disadvantages for us because we get to see the world, but we don't like it because we have to leave friends and move school.
